entry.title: Polkadot Project Manta Network Rolls Out Privacy-Centric Soulbound Tokens
entry.summary: By teaming up with Linea, Manta is launching so-called zkSBTs that prove identities without leaking any personal details.

entry.title: Regulators Should Block Firms From ‘Combining’ Crypto Functions, Says IOSCO
entry.summary: The IOSCO’s new 18-point plan tells Securities Commissions around the world how to regulate crypto and avoid another FTX.

entry.title: Tornado Cash Sanctions Key to Drop in Crypto Hacks Last Quarter: TRM Labs
entry.summary: TRM Labs highlighted the importance of the sanctions on Tornado Cash for making crypto hacks less lucrative for attackers.

entry.title: FTX CEO Charged $1,040 to 'Review And Finalize 2.0 Reboot of Exchange Material'
entry.summary: FTX's new management, led by CEO John J. Ray III, is mulling a revival of Sam Bankman-Fried's defunct crypto exchange, per a new filing.

entry.title: 'Web3 Creates a Tighter Bond' Between Audiences, Creators: MyCo CCO
entry.summary: MyCo’s streaming platform CCO Phil McKenzie talks with Decrypt about the Film3 movement and the Metacannes festival he helped to organize occurring alongside the Festival de Cannes. He explains how Web3 can help creators to find funding and create new ways to interact with the audience.

entry.title: You Can Now Buy Stepn NFTs on iOS—But You'll Have to Pay the Apple Tax
entry.summary: Stepn's iPhone app now lets you buy NFTs and use Apple Pay, but the prices are much higher.

entry.title: MicroStrategy's Michael Saylor: Early Bitcoin BRC-20 Uses May Be ‘Illegal’
entry.summary: Saylor isn’t completely against them, claiming it “partly comes down to use case and partly to how they are perceived.”

entry.title: AI-Generated Hoax of Pentagon Explosion Sparks Brief Market Sell-Off
entry.summary: An AI-generated image caused confusion and a temporary stock market sell-off. Bitcoin had its small dose of pain too.

entry.title: Immutable's Chris Clay: Crypto Can Solve the 'Dreaded Rollback' in MMORPGs
entry.summary: Immutable VP and Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how Immutable is actually immutable—and how that changes everything for both developers and players.

entry.title: Tokenized Securities on Ethereum, Polygon, Gnosis Hit $225M Market Cap
entry.summary: The only hurdle that could slow the tokenization of stocks and bonds on the blockchain is a lack of regulatory clarity, say experts.

entry.title: Tornado Cash Governance Attacker Offers DAO New Lifeline—And an Expensive Lesson
entry.summary: Tornado Cash's governance troubles may be coming to a conclusion, after the attacker proposed returning the ill-gotten TORN tokens.

entry.title: Openfort Raises $3 Million for 'Frictionless' Web3 Gaming Wallet
entry.summary: Openfort is building infrastructure for game developers and aims to reduce the number of times gamers have to engage with the blockchain.

entry.title: Why the PBA Is Putting Bowling Awards On-Chain With Avalanche NFTs
entry.summary: The Professional Bowlers Association will deliver “digital awards” to some 300,000 league bowlers, with further expansion plans ahead.

entry.title: Malaysia’s Securities Commission Orders Crypto Exchange Huobi to Halt Operations
entry.summary: The Securities Commission in Malaysia today announced that it's shuttering Huobi's local operations due to compliance concerns.

entry.title: Hotbit Shutters Crypto Exchange, Urges Users to Withdraw Funds
entry.summary: The team behind Hotbit said centralized exchanges were become “increasingly cumbersome,” adding that users should withdraw funds by June 21.

entry.title: Gemini Says DCG Missed $630M Genesis Loan Payment
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Gemini earlier warned DCG was risking defaulting on its obligations if unable to pay the $630 million Genesis debt.

entry.title: What Is Inferno Drainer? New Phishing Scam Pilfering Crypto, NFTs
entry.summary: In just a few weeks, phishing scam Inferno Drainer has made off with nearly $6 million in various cryptocurrences and NFTs.

entry.title: No, MetaMask Will Not Withhold Your Crypto for Taxes
entry.summary: "Legal terminology can be complex," the company admitted but called the claim false and inaccurate.

entry.title: Biden Slams Wealthy Crypto Traders as U.S. Budget Talks Resume
entry.summary: The U.S. President's remarks come as critical budget negotiations resume in Washington, D.C. today.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: SEC Dragnet Drags On
entry.summary: The regulator's recent response to Coinbase indicates that it “is likely to continue changing its mind along the way.”

entry.title: Presidential Candidate Kennedy Vows to Defend Bitcoin Against ‘Invasive Surveillance’
entry.summary: At Bitcoin 2023, Kennedy called Bitcoin a bulwark against government and corporate intrusion.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Smash Amazon Debut, Sells Over 20,000 Toys
entry.summary: The “Phygital” toy collection brings in half a million dollars in sales in two days.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: SEC and CBDC News Drives XRP Rally During Slow Week
entry.summary: For the third week running, the prices of most leading cryptocurrencies didn’t move much.

entry.title: Gary Vee Is Hyped About AI—And Expands VeeCon Beyond NFTs
entry.summary: With VeeCon 2023 underway, Gary Vaynerchuk joins Decrypt to discuss the rise of AI and his take on the volatile NFT market.

entry.title: Gary Vee Discusses the Rise and Impact of AI
entry.summary: During VeeCon 2023, entrepreneur spoke with Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about the rise of AI tools, what excites him about the technology, and what kind of impact he thinks it will have on creators and business.

entry.title: Meme Tokens and NFTs Took Over Bitcoin—Now It's Happening on Dogecoin and Litecoin
entry.summary: Ordinals hype has spread from Bitcoin to both Dogecoin and Litecoin, driving network activity on all three chains to recent all-time peaks.

entry.title: DeFi Heavyweight Lido Finance Mulls LDO Staking, Token Buyback
entry.summary: Liquid staking protocol Lido Finance is looking to add a bit more utility to what is just a simple voting token. Here's how LDO could change.

entry.title: Apple Bans Employees From Using ChatGPT Over AI Privacy Fears: WSJ
entry.summary: Tech giant Apple reportedly restricted internal use of the AI chatbot over data leak concerns, joining Samsung and other corporate giants.

entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Says COVID Protests Led Him to Bitcoin
entry.summary: RFK Jr. is deep down the Bitcoin rabbit hole—and it was the vaccine-mandate protests in Canada that got him started down the path.

entry.title: Meet the Dudes Using AI Chatbots to Get Real Dates
entry.summary: Can ChatGPT help you find your significant other? Some guys are definitely scoring.

entry.title: Gary Vee Discusses VeeCon 2023's Broader Shift Beyond Web3
entry.summary: VeeCon is back in 2023, moving from Minneapolis to Indianapolis, and creator and entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss his aim to make it the "coolest business conference in the world." And that means expanding the focus beyond NFTs and Web3 to include AI and other tech innovations, along with broader business and pop culture content.

entry.title: Gary Vee on the NFT Market and Why 'NFTs Are Stuffed Animals'
entry.summary: Gary Vaynerchuk called the NFT market decline back in 2021, but the owner of CryptoPunks and other valuable tokenized assets still believes that a sustainable market will eventually form. He joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward amid VeeCon 2023 to discuss why he thinks the NFT space will be comparable to collectible sports cards, art, and even stuffed animals.

entry.title: What Immutable's Chris Clay Learned in 23 Years of Game Development
entry.summary: Immutable VP & Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what it's like to work in the game industry for decades and why he's not giving up on NFT games.

entry.title: Las Vegas Man Charged in CoinDeal $45M Crypto Fraud Case
entry.summary: A Las Vegas man has been hit with new charges as part of the CoinDeal crypto and metaverse alleged scam—and could face up to 100 years behind bars.

entry.title: Biden's 30% Tax on Bitcoin Miners 'Isn't Going to Happen,' Says Cynthia Lummis
entry.summary: Crypto legislation has been hard to work on due to "fear that Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are being used for criminal activities,” Lummis said.

entry.title: Another CertiK Audited Project Rugs as $3M Disappears From Arbitrum DeFi Exchange
entry.summary: The team behind Swaprum appears to have disappeared with $3 million in customer funds.

entry.title: Your Old Game Boy Can Now Be Turned Into a Bitcoin and Ethereum Hardware Wallet
entry.summary: Crypto startup Keyp is creating an offline crypto storage solution with a Game Boy cartridge that gamifies the seed phrase process.

entry.title: Deadfellaz NFT Owners Can Now Use Their Avatars in Twitch Streams
entry.summary: The Ethereum project just launched Streamingfellaz, letting NFT holders appear as their zombified avatars on streams and video calls.

entry.title: DeFi Projects Built on Ethereum Scaling Solution Starknet Hit $10M
entry.summary: The total value locked in smart contracts using the Ethereum Layer-2 scaling solution has just hit an all-time high of over $10 million.

entry.title: Stablecoin Issuers Pour Money Into DC as Crypto Legislation Hits Agendas
entry.summary: Stablecoin issuers Tether and Circle have been regularly paying lobbyists to stay on top of possible regulations.

entry.title: 'So Much Anger, So Much Hate', Says Ledger Co-Founder Amid Botched Recover Service Launch
entry.summary: After Crypto Twitter took Ledger to the chopping block over its Recover service, the firm’s co-founder took to Reddit to explain his views

entry.title: Australia’s Stock Exchange ASX Axes Blockchain Initiative—for Good
entry.summary: The leading stock exchange Downunder no longer considers blockchain among possible technologies for its trading software upgrade.

entry.title: Coinbase Finally Launches Subscription Service Overseas, Focuses on Staking
entry.summary: The exchange has launched Coinbase One—and is accelerating its push overseas.

entry.title: Why Azra Games CEO Mark Otero is Not a Fan of "Play-to-Earn" Games
entry.summary: "Each game is a miracle," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero. In this clip, he shares his thoughts on "play-to-earn" games and gamer motivation with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: How Many Games Are Building On Solana? The Answer Might Surprise You
entry.summary: Solana Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the current state of Solana's Web3 gaming ecosystem.

entry.title: Problems With Being an 'On-Chain Purist' in Gaming
entry.summary: InfiniGods Cofounders Owen O'Donoghue and Damon Gura keep it real with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, sharing thoughts on game balancing and what to do when in-game assets become NFTs.

entry.title: Why Solana Won't Become A Web3 Game Publisher
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Solana's "build together" approach as well as his thoughts on crypto firms becoming game publishers.

entry.title: The State Of Web3 Gaming On Hedera
entry.summary: Hedera VP Alex Russman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Hedera's Web3 gaming ecosystem and shares a game he's particularly excited about.

entry.title: How Mirandus is Innovating Video Game Audio
entry.summary: Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game's thoughtful approach to audio design and the technologies being built to support the MMORPG's immersive world.

entry.title: Do Gamers Hate NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks the InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue about gamers and NFTs.

entry.title: gm: Avenged Sevenfold's M. Shadows on Deathbats, Fandom, and AI
entry.summary: Avenged Sevenfold lead singer Matt Sanders, aka M. Shadows, is rehearsing for the band's upcoming tour. He's also figuring out how to upend what it means to be a music fan. The band launched a Deathbats Club NFT collection in 2021. That is to say: They were early. The lead singer said it was timed to give fans a chance to get comfortable with Web3 technology ahead of the group's 2023 tour, when the NFT holders can use their Deathbats for early access to tickets. M. Shadows also talked to hosts Andrew Hayward and Stephen Graves about AI and bringing Web3 into gaming.

entry.title: Inside Mojo Melee's Lore with Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella
entry.summary: At the Game Developers' Conference, Mojo Melee Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their autobattler game and its unique characters, which are also NFTs on Polygon.

entry.title: Why 'Blair Witch' Exec Producer Kevin Foxe Is '1,000% In' on Gaming
entry.summary: "The Blair Witch Project" Executive Producer Kevin Foxe wants to avoid corporate overlords and enlighten fans of the dark "Mandala" graphic novel with a video game adaptation and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

entry.title: Gala Games Co-Founder on the Aesthetic of Mirandus
entry.summary: "When assets are overdone, they just feel a little dirty. It's not pretty to look at," shared Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games co-founder Michael McCarthy in an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Solana Games GM: Play-to-Earn Games Are DeFi Products, Not Games
entry.summary: Solana Games' General Manager Johnny Lee offers a hot take on the first generation of Web3 gaming with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Brycent's Advice For Gaming Content Creators
entry.summary: XSET's Brycent shares his advice for Web3 content creators with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, including which social media platform is best for posting content.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes of Jeremy Cowart's 'Auras' NFT Event
entry.summary: A look at the preparation behind "Auras," an event in which photographer Jeremy Cowart produced and starred in 10,000 photo-based NFTs, captured in less than 30 minutes before a live audience. Credit: Brett Carlsen for Decrypt
